name: openscenario_generation_osc_en
instruction: Based on the provided autonomous driving test scenario description, please write the corresponding OpenScenario v2.0 DSL file. Ensure you correctly define the initial speeds, relative positions, and lane relationships for the Ego and Target vehicles.

instances.input: The leading vehicle is traveling at 20 km/h in the same lane, and the ego vehicle is traveling at 30 km/h.
instances.output:
# 测试场景: 车到车右侧汇入 (CCRM - Car-to-Car Right Merge)
# 描述: 测试前方有缓行车辆时的跟随和超车决策
# 场景: 自车行驶中,前方20-50米处有以20kph缓行的车辆

import "$PROJECT_DIR/projectLibs/project_scenario_base/project_base_scenario_model_ssp.osc"
import "$OSC2LIB/scenarios/free_drive/ego_free_drive_auto_gen/ego_free_drive_auto_gen_one_way_road_top.osc"
import "$OSC2LIB/scenarios/free_drive/npc_driving/npc_free_driving_top.osc"

extend test_config:
    set map = "$OSC2LIB/maps/M499_FTX_suburban.xodr"

scenario sut.ccrm_test_run inherits project_base_scenario:
    keep(default scenario_str_generic == "ccrm_test_run")
    
    # 测试道路
    my_road: one_way_road

    ego_lane: int 

    # 自车起始速度
    start_speed: speed with:
        keep(default it in [20kph, 30kph, 40kph, 50kph, 60kph, 70kph, 80kph])

    keep(sut.car.ftx_driver.bypass_behavior.allow_opposite_left_side == true)

    do serial():
        set_up: parallel():
            # 自车自由行驶
            ego_free_drive_phase: sut.ego_free_drive_auto_gen_one_way_road() with:
                keep(it.gen_ego_speed_at_start == start_speed)
                keep(it.ego_road_element == my_road)
                keep(it.gen_min_lanes == 1)
                keep(it.gen_max_lanes == 2)
                keep(it.gen_ego_lane_at_start == ego_lane)
                keep(it.ego_driving_duration == 15s)

            # 前方缓行NPC车辆
            npc_driving_phase: sut.npc_free_driving() with:
                keep(it.npc_relative_position in [20m..50m])
                keep(it.npc_initial_speed == 20kph)
                keep(it.npc_target_speed == 20kph)
                keep(it.gen_min_lanes == 1)
                keep(it.gen_max_lanes == 2)
                keep(it.npc_duration == 15s)
                keep(it.npc_initial_lane == ego_lane)
                keep(it.npc_target_lane == ego_lane)
                keep(it.ref_car == sut.car)

extend top.main:
    do sut.ccrm_test_run()

extend test_additional_parameters:
    const test_index: string

extend test_config:
    set test_name = "ccrm_test_run"
    set additional_parameters.test_index = "auto_20251106_075241"

name: openscenario_generation_osc_en
instruction: Create an OpenScenario v2.0 DSL file based on the provided scenario description. Identify the main traffic participants (such as vehicles, two-wheelers, etc.), and configure their relative positional relationships, motion states, and trigger logic as described. Ensure the DSL syntax follows OpenSCENARIO v2.0 standards with proper entity declarations, catalog references, and updated action structures.

instances.input: An electric scooter moves in the same direction as the vehicle at a speed of 15 km/h, at a distance of 19m. The vehicle is traveling at 20 km/h to test for collision.
instances.output:
# 测试场景: 自行车左侧避让 (CBLA - Crossing Bicycle Left Avoidance)
# 描述: 测试自行车沿道路行驶时的避让行为
# 场景: 自车行驶中,行人以15kph沿道路最右侧车道移动

import "$PROJECT_DIR/projectLibs/project_scenario_base/project_base_scenario_model_ssp.osc"
import "$OSC2LIB/scenarios/free_drive/ego_free_drive_auto_gen/ego_free_drive_auto_gen_one_way_road_top.osc"

extend test_config:
    set map = "$OSC2LIB/maps/M499_FTX_suburban.xodr"

extend vru_driver:
    keep(default vru_behavior.enable == false)

scenario sut.cbla_test_run inherits project_base_scenario:
    keep(default scenario_str_generic == "cbla_test_run")

    # 测试道路
    road: one_way_road
    
    # VRU行人
    vru: cyclist
    
    # 起始和结束位置
    start_position: msp_position
    end_position: msp_position

    # 起始偏移
    start_offset: length with:
        keep(it <= road.length - 100m)

    # 自车起始速度
    start_speed: speed with:
        keep(default it in [20kph, 30kph, 40kph, 50kph, 60kph])

    # VRU速度
    vru_speed: speed with:
        keep(default it == 15kph)


    # VRU起始偏移
    vru_start_offset: length with:
        keep(default it == 6m)

    # 测试持续时间
    duration_time: time with:
        keep(it >= vru_start_offset / vru_speed + 2s)
        keep(it <= 3 * vru_start_offset / vru_speed + 2s)

    # VRU起始位置 (最右侧车道)
    position_along_road(
        start_position, 
        road,
        lon_offset: start_offset + vru_start_offset,
        lat_offset: 0m, 
        rightmost_lane: true
    )

    # VRU结束位置
    position_along_road(
        end_position, 
        road,
        lon_offset: start_offset + vru_start_offset + duration_time * vru_speed,
        lat_offset: 0m, 
        rightmost_lane: true
    )

    keep(sut.car.ftx_driver.bypass_behavior.allow_opposite_left_side == true)

    on @set_up.start:
        call logger.log_info("start_speed       : $(start_speed)")
        call logger.log_info("vru_speed         : $(vru_speed)")
        call logger.log_info("vru_start_offset  : $(vru_start_offset)")
        call logger.log_info("duration_time     : $(duration_time)")

    do serial():
        set_up: parallel():
            # 自车自由行驶
            ego_free_drive_phase: sut.ego_free_drive_auto_gen_one_way_road() with:
                keep(it.gen_ego_speed_at_start == start_speed)
                keep(it.ego_road_element == road)
                keep(it.gen_min_lanes == 2)
                keep(it.gen_max_lanes == 2)
                keep(it.gen_ego_lane_at_start == 2)
                keep(it.ego_start_offset == start_offset)
                keep(it.ego_driving_duration == duration_time)

            # VRU沿道路移动
            vru.move(end_position, start_position, duration: duration_time)

extend top.main:
    do sut.cbla_test_run()

extend test_additional_parameters:
    const test_index: string

extend test_config:
    set test_name = "cbla_test_run"
    set additional_parameters.test_index = "auto_20251106_075241"

name: openscenario_generation_osc_en
instruction: Please generate the OpenScenario v2.0 DSL file corresponding to the following autonomous driving test intent description. Ensure the vehicle layout, initial speeds, and interaction behaviors (such as overtaking or lane changing) are correctly implemented. The DSL should follow the OpenSCENARIO v2.0 syntax and structure, including proper scenario definitions, entity declarations, and action sequences.

instances.input: Two vehicles are traveling in the same direction separated by one lane at a speed of 50 km/h. During the process, the NPC vehicle changes lanes inward.
instances.output:
# 场景: bsd_c2c_test_run
# 描述: 三车道道路,自车在车道1,NPC从车道3变道至车道2(自车盲区)
# 地图: M499_FTX_suburban.xodr (市郊)

import "$PROJECT_DIR/projectLibs/project_scenario_base/project_base_scenario_model_ssp.osc"
import "$OSC2LIB/scenarios/free_drive/ego_free_drive_auto_gen/ego_free_drive_auto_gen_one_way_road_top.osc"
import "$OSC2LIB/scenarios/free_drive/npc_driving/npc_cut_in_top.osc"

extend test_config:
    set map = "$OSC2LIB/maps/M499_FTX_suburban.xodr"

scenario sut.bsd_c2c_test_run inherits project_base_scenario:
    keep(default scenario_str_generic == "bsd_c2c_test_run")
    
    # 测试道路
    my_road: one_way_road

    # 起始偏移
    start_offset: length with:
        keep(it <= my_road.length - 150m)

    # 自车速度
    ego_speed: speed with:
        keep(default it == 50kph)

    # NPC速度
    npc_speed: speed with:
        keep(default it == 50kph)

    # NPC相对位置 (负值表示在自车后方)
    npc_relative_position: length with:
        keep(default it in [-10m..0m])

    # 变道开始时间
    lane_change_start_time: time with:
        keep(default it in [3s..5s])

    # 变道持续时间
    lane_change_duration: time with:
        keep(default it in [3s..5s])

    # 测试持续时间
    duration_time: time with:
        keep(it >= lane_change_start_time + lane_change_duration + 3s)

    keep(sut.car.ftx_driver.bypass_behavior.allow_opposite_left_side == true)

    on @set_up.start:
        call logger.log_info("ego_speed: $(ego_speed)")
        call logger.log_info("npc_speed: $(npc_speed)")
        call logger.log_info("npc_relative_position: $(npc_relative_position)")
        call logger.log_info("lane_change_start_time: $(lane_change_start_time)")
        call logger.log_info("lane_change_duration: $(lane_change_duration)")
        call logger.log_info("duration_time: $(duration_time)")

    do serial():
        set_up: parallel():
            # 自车在车道1行驶
            ego_free_drive_phase: sut.ego_free_drive_auto_gen_one_way_road() with:
                keep(it.gen_ego_speed_at_start == ego_speed)
                keep(it.ego_road_element == my_road)
                keep(it.gen_min_lanes == 3)
                keep(it.gen_max_lanes == 3)
                keep(it.gen_ego_lane_at_start == 1)
                keep(it.gen_ego_lane_at_end == 2)
                keep(it.ego_start_offset == start_offset)
                keep(it.ego_driving_duration == duration_time)

            # NPC从车道3变道至车道2
            npc_cut_in_phase: sut.npc_cut_in() with:
                keep(it.npc_relative_position == self.npc_relative_position)
                keep(it.npc_initial_speed == npc_speed)
                # keep(it.npc_target_speed == npc_speed)
                keep(it.npc_initial_lane == 3)
                keep(it.npc_target_lane == 2)
                keep(it.npc_cut_in_start_time == lane_change_start_time)
                keep(it.npc_cut_in_duration == lane_change_duration)
                keep(it.npc_duration == duration_time)
                keep(it.ref_car == sut.car)

extend top.main:
    do sut.bsd_c2c_test_run()

extend test_additional_parameters:
    const test_index: string

extend test_config:
    set test_name = "bsd_c2c_test_run"
    set additional_parameters.test_index = "auto_20251106_075241"

name: openscenario_generation_osc_en
instruction: Please create an OpenScenario v2.0 DSL file based on the description of the autonomous driving test scenario. Ensure you correctly define the key traffic participants (Ego, Obj1, Obj2), their initial states, and the lane change maneuver triggered by the stationary obstacle ahead. The DSL should utilize the enhanced syntax and features available in OpenSCENARIO v2.0, including but not limited to: updated parameter definitions, improved trajectory specifications, enhanced conditional logic, and modern actor naming conventions. Pay special attention to the new semantic structures and ensure all elements are properly scoped within the v2.0 framework while maintaining the same functional behavior as the original v1.0 scenario.

instances.input: The leading vehicle travels at 50 km/h and cuts out (changes lanes) to avoid a stationary obstacle 44m ahead.
instances.output:
# 场景: cut_out_test_run
# 描述: 自车与NPC同速行驶,前方有障碍物,NPC车辆切出到相邻车道
# 地图: M499_FTX_suburban.xodr (市郊)

import "$PROJECT_DIR/projectLibs/project_scenario_base/project_base_scenario_model_ssp.osc"
import "$OSC2LIB/scenarios/free_drive/ego_free_drive_auto_gen/ego_free_drive_auto_gen_one_way_road_top.osc"
import "$OSC2LIB/scenarios/free_drive/npc_driving/npc_cut_out_top.osc"
import "$OSC2LIB/scenarios/free_drive/npc_driving/npc_free_driving_top.osc"

extend test_config:
    set map = "$OSC2LIB/maps/M499_FTX_suburban.xodr"

scenario sut.cut_out_test_run inherits project_base_scenario:
    keep(default scenario_str_generic == "cut_out_test_run")
    
    # 测试道路
    my_road: one_way_road
    
    # 自车车道
    ego_lane: int with:
        keep(it >= 1)
    
    # NPC目标车道 (相邻车道)
    npc_target_lane: int with:
        keep(it >= 1)
        keep(default it in [ego_lane - 1, ego_lane + 1])

    # 起始偏移
    start_offset: length with:
        keep(it <= my_road.length - 200m)

    # 行驶速度 (自车和NPC相同)
    drive_speed: speed with:
        keep(default it == 50kph)

    # NPC相对自车位置
    npc_relative_position: length with:
        keep(default it == 10m)

    # 变道开始时间
    lane_change_start_time: time with:
        keep(default it in [0s..1s])

    # 变道持续时间
    lane_change_duration: time with:
        keep(default it in [3s..4s])

    # 障碍物相对自车位置
    obstacle_relative_position: length with:
        keep(default it == 44m)

    # 测试持续时间
    duration_time: time with:
        keep(default it == 6s)

    keep(sut.car.ftx_driver.bypass_behavior.allow_opposite_left_side == true)

    on @set_up.start:
        call logger.log_info("Ego / NPC speed:         $(drive_speed)")
        call logger.log_info("NPC rel pos:             $(npc_relative_position)")
        call logger.log_info("NPC lane change: start   $(lane_change_start_time)  dur $(lane_change_duration)")
        call logger.log_info("Obstacle rel pos:        $(obstacle_relative_position)")
        call logger.log_info("Scenario duration:       $(duration_time)")

    do serial():
        set_up: parallel():
            # 自车自由行驶阶段
            ego_free_drive_phase: sut.ego_free_drive_auto_gen_one_way_road() with:
                keep(it.gen_ego_speed_at_start == drive_speed)
                keep(it.ego_road_element == my_road)
                keep(it.gen_min_lanes == 2)
                keep(it.gen_ego_lane_at_start == ego_lane)
                keep(it.gen_ego_lane_at_end == ego_lane)
                keep(it.ego_start_offset == start_offset)
                keep(it.ego_driving_duration == duration_time)

            # NPC切出阶段
            npc_cut_out_phase: sut.npc_cut_out() with:
                keep(it.npc_relative_position == self.npc_relative_position)
                keep(it.npc_initial_speed == drive_speed)
                keep(it.npc_target_speed == drive_speed)
                keep(it.npc_initial_lane == ego_lane)
                keep(it.npc_target_lane == self.npc_target_lane)
                keep(it.npc_cut_out_start_time == lane_change_start_time)
                keep(it.npc_cut_out_duration == lane_change_duration)
                keep(it.npc_duration == duration_time)
                keep(it.ref_car == sut.car)

            # 障碍物阶段 (静止的公交车)
            obstacle_phase: sut.npc_free_driving() with:
                keep(it.npc_relative_position == obstacle_relative_position)
                keep(it.npc_initial_speed == 0kph)
                keep(it.npc_target_speed == 0kph)
                keep(it.npc_initial_lane == ego_lane)
                keep(it.npc_target_lane == ego_lane)
                keep(it.npc_vehicle_type == bus)
                keep(it.npc_duration == duration_time)
                keep(it.ref_car == sut.car)

extend top.main:
    do sut.cut_out_test_run()

extend test_additional_parameters:
    const test_index: string

extend test_config:
    set test_name = "cut_out_test_run"
    set additional_parameters.test_index = "auto_20251121_000003"

name: openscenario_generation_osc_en
instruction: The input describes a test scenario involving a vehicle and a two-wheeler. Please generate the corresponding OpenSCENARIO v2.0 DSL file, correctly configuring the main traffic participants, their motion trajectories, speed parameters, and trigger conditions.

instances.input: An electric scooter moves perpendicularly towards the vehicle from the right side of the vehicle's forward path at a speed of 15 km/h, at a distance of 40m. The vehicle is traveling at 20 km/h to test for collision.
instances.output:
# 测试场景: 自行车无等待穿越 (CBNA - Crossing Bicycle No Avoidance)
# 描述: 测试自行车从右侧穿越道路时的避让行为
# 场景: 自车行驶中,自行车从右侧以15kph横穿道路,不等待

import "$PROJECT_DIR/projectLibs/project_scenario_base/project_base_scenario_model_ssp.osc"
import "$OSC2LIB/scenarios/free_drive/ego_free_drive_auto_gen/ego_free_drive_auto_gen_one_way_road_top.osc"
import "$OSC2LIB/scenarios/crossing_VRU/vru_crossing/vru_crossing_cyclist_no_wait_top.osc"

extend test_config:
    set map = "$OSC2LIB/maps/M499_FTX_suburban.xodr"

scenario sut.cbna_test_run inherits project_base_scenario:
    keep(default scenario_str_generic == "cbna_test_run")
    
    # 测试道路
    road: one_way_road

    # 起始偏移
    start_offset: length with:
        keep(it <= road.length - 100m)

    # 自车起始速度
    start_speed: speed with:
        keep(default it in [20kph, 30kph, 40kph, 50kph, 60kph, 70kph, 80kph])

    # VRU起始偏移距离
    vru_start_offset: length with:
        keep(it in [start_speed * 1s + 5m..start_speed * 1s + 20m])

    # 测试持续时间
    duration_time: time with:
        keep(it >= vru_start_offset / start_speed + 2s)

    # 横向偏移
    lat_offset: length with:
        keep(it in [vru_start_offset / start_speed * 5kph - 5m..vru_start_offset / start_speed * 5kph])

    keep(sut.car.ftx_driver.bypass_behavior.allow_opposite_left_side == true)

    on @set_up.start:
        call logger.log_info("start_speed: $(start_speed)")
        call logger.log_info("vru_start_offset: $(vru_start_offset)")
        call logger.log_info("duration_time: $(duration_time)")
        call logger.log_info("lat_offset: $(lat_offset)")

    do serial():
        set_up: parallel():
            # 自车自由行驶
            ego_free_drive_phase: sut.ego_free_drive_auto_gen_one_way_road() with:
                keep(it.gen_ego_speed_at_start == start_speed)
                keep(it.ego_road_element == road)
                keep(it.gen_min_lanes == 1)
                keep(it.gen_max_lanes == 2)
                keep(it.gen_ego_lane_at_start == 1)
                keep(it.ego_start_offset == start_offset)
                keep(it.ego_driving_duration == duration_time)

            # 自行车穿越阶段
            vru_crossing_phase: sut.vru_crossing_cyclist_no_wait() with:
                keep(it.move_from == right)
                keep(it.gen_cyclist_longitudinal_distance == vru_start_offset + start_offset)
                keep(it.gen_cyclist_lateral_distance == lat_offset)
                keep(it.gen_cyclist_speed == 15kph)
                keep(it.gen_number_of_cyclists == 1)
                keep(it.up_coming_car == sut.car)
                keep(it.my_road == road)

extend top.main:
    do sut.cbna_test_run()

extend test_additional_parameters:
    const test_index: string

extend test_config:
    set test_name = "cbna_test_run"
    set additional_parameters.test_index = "auto_20251106_075241"

name: openscenario_generation_osc_en
instruction: Please generate an OpenScenario v2.0 DSL file that implements the autonomous driving test scenario described in the input. Include the key elements such as vehicle speed, pedestrian motion, relative positions, and trigger logic using the enhanced syntax and features available in OpenSCENARIO v2.0.

instances.input: A pedestrian moves perpendicularly towards the vehicle from the left side of the vehicle's forward path at a speed of 6.5 km/h, at a distance of 6m. The vehicle is traveling at 20 km/h to test for collision.
instances.output:
# 测试场景: 行人前方避让 (CPFA - Crossing Pedestrian Front Avoidance)
# 描述: 测试行人从道路前方穿越时的避让行为
# 场景: 自车行驶中,行人以6.5kph从前方穿越道路

import "$PROJECT_DIR/projectLibs/project_scenario_base/project_base_scenario_model_ssp.osc"
import "$OSC2LIB/scenarios/free_drive/ego_free_drive_auto_gen/ego_free_drive_auto_gen_one_way_road_top.osc"
import "$OSC2LIB/scenarios/crossing_VRU/vru_crossing/vru_crossing_pedestrian_no_wait_top.osc"

scenario sut.cpfa_test_run inherits project_base_scenario:

    # 测试道路

    # 起始偏移

        keep(it <= road.length - 100m)

    # 自车起始速度

        keep(default it in [20kph, 30kph, 40kph, 50kph, 60kph, 70kph, 80kph])

    # VRU起始偏移距离
    vru_start_offset: length with:
        keep(it in [start_speed * 1s + 10m..start_speed * 1s + 20m])

    # 测试持续时间
    duration_time: time with:
        keep(it >= vru_start_offset / start_speed + 2s)

    # 横向偏移
    lat_offset: length with:
        keep(it in [vru_start_offset / start_speed * 6.5kph - 1m..vru_start_offset / start_speed * 6.5kph + 1m])

    keep(sut.car.ftx_driver.bypass_behavior.allow_opposite_left_side == true)

    on @set_up.start:
        call logger.log_info("start_speed: $(start_speed)")
        call logger.log_info("vru_start_offset: $(vru_start_offset)")
        call logger.log_info("duration_time: $(duration_time)")
        call logger.log_info("lat_offset: $(lat_offset)")

    do serial():
        set_up: parallel():
            # 自车自由行驶
            ego_free_drive_phase: sut.ego_free_drive_auto_gen_one_way_road() with:
                keep(it.gen_ego_speed_at_start == start_speed)
                keep(it.ego_road_element == road)
                keep(it.gen_min_lanes == 1)
                keep(it.gen_max_lanes == 2)
                keep(it.gen_ego_lane_at_start == 1)
                keep(it.ego_start_offset == start_offset)
                keep(it.ego_driving_duration == duration_time)

            # 行人穿越阶段
            vru_crossing_phase: sut.vru_crossing_pedestrian_no_wait() with:
                keep(it.gen_pedestrian_longitudinal_distance == vru_start_offset + start_offset)
                keep(it.gen_pedestrian_lateral_distance == lat_offset)
                keep(it.gen_pedestrian_speed == 6.5kph)
                keep(it.gen_number_of_pedestrians == 1)
                keep(it.up_coming_car == sut.car)
                keep(it.my_road == road)

extend top.main:
    do sut.cpfa_test_run()

extend test_additional_parameters:
    const test_index: string

extend test_config:
    set test_name = "cpfa_test_run"
    set additional_parameters.test_index = "auto_20251106_075241"

name: openscenario_generation_osc_en
instruction: Based on the provided autonomous driving test intent, generate the OpenScenario v2.0 DSL file. The scenario involves specific traffic participants (e.g., cars, motorcycles) with defined initial speeds and relative positions.

instances.input: The vehicle speed is 40 km/h, and a motorcycle alongside is overtaking at 50 km/h.
instances.output:
# 场景: bsd_c2tw_test_run
# 描述: 两车道道路,较快的摩托车从后方相邻车道接近自车盲区
# 地图: M499_FTX_suburban.xodr (市郊)

import "$PROJECT_DIR/projectLibs/project_scenario_base/project_base_scenario_model_ssp.osc"
import "$OSC2LIB/scenarios/free_drive/ego_free_drive_auto_gen/ego_free_drive_auto_gen_one_way_road_top.osc"
import "$OSC2LIB/scenarios/free_drive/npc_driving/npc_free_driving_top.osc"

extend test_config:
    set map = "$OSC2LIB/maps/M499_FTX_suburban.xodr"

scenario sut.bsd_c2tw_test_run inherits project_base_scenario:
    keep(default scenario_str_generic == "bsd_c2tw_test_run")
    
    # 测试道路
    my_road: one_way_road
    
    # 自车车道
    ego_lane: int with:
        keep(it >= 1)
    
    # NPC车道 (相邻车道)
    npc_lane: int with:
        keep(it >= 1)
        keep(default it in [ego_lane - 1, ego_lane + 1])

    # 自车速度
    ego_speed: speed with:
        keep(default it == 40kph)

    # NPC速度 (摩托车速度更快)
    npc_speed: speed with:
        keep(default it == 50kph)

    # NPC相对距离 (负值表示在自车后方)
    npc_relative_distance: length with:
        keep(default it in [-20m..-10m])

    # 起始偏移
    start_offset: length with:
        keep(it <= my_road.length - 200m)

    # 测试持续时间
    duration_time: time with:
        keep(default it == 20s)

    keep(sut.car.ftx_driver.bypass_behavior.allow_opposite_left_side == true)

    on @set_up.start:
        call logger.log_info("Ego speed: $(ego_speed)")
        call logger.log_info("Motorcycle speed: $(npc_speed)")
        call logger.log_info("Initial gap (NPC behind Ego): $(npc_relative_distance)")
        call logger.log_info("Scenario duration: $(duration_time)")

    do serial():
        set_up: parallel():
            # 自车自由行驶
            ego_free_drive_phase: sut.ego_free_drive_auto_gen_one_way_road() with:
                keep(it.gen_ego_speed_at_start == ego_speed)
                keep(it.ego_road_element == my_road)
                keep(it.gen_min_lanes == 2)
                keep(it.gen_ego_lane_at_start == ego_lane)
                keep(it.gen_ego_lane_at_end == ego_lane)
                keep(it.ego_start_offset == start_offset)
                keep(it.ego_driving_duration == duration_time)

            # NPC摩托车从后方接近
            npc_driving_phase: sut.npc_free_driving() with:
                keep(it.npc_relative_position == npc_relative_distance)
                keep(it.npc_initial_speed == npc_speed)
                keep(it.npc_target_speed == npc_speed)
                keep(it.npc_initial_lane == npc_lane)
                keep(it.npc_target_lane == npc_lane)
                keep(it.npc_vehicle_type == motorcycle)
                keep(it.npc_duration == duration_time)
                keep(it.ref_car == sut.car)

extend top.main:
    do sut.bsd_c2tw_test_run()

extend test_additional_parameters:
    const test_index: string

extend test_config:
    set test_name = "bsd_c2tw_test_run"
    set additional_parameters.test_index = "auto_20251121_000001"

name: openscenario_generation_osc_en
instruction: You are an autonomous driving scenario architect. Convert the following natural language description of a traffic scenario into a valid OpenSCENARIO v2.0 DSL file, ensuring all participant behaviors and triggers are accurately represented.

instances.input: A pedestrian moves perpendicularly towards the vehicle from the right side of the vehicle's forward path at a speed of 5 km/h. The vehicle is traveling at 20 km/h to test for collision.
instances.output:
# 测试场景: 行人无避让穿越 (CPNA - Crossing Pedestrian No Avoidance)
# 描述: 测试行人沿道路移动时的避让行为
# 场景: 自车行驶中,行人以6.5kph沿最右侧车道移动

import "$PROJECT_DIR/projectLibs/project_scenario_base/project_base_scenario_model_ssp.osc"
import "$OSC2LIB/scenarios/free_drive/ego_free_drive_auto_gen/ego_free_drive_auto_gen_one_way_road_top.osc"
import "$OSC2LIB/scenarios/crossing_VRU/vru_crossing/vru_crossing_pedestrian_no_wait_top.osc"

extend test_config:
    set map = "$OSC2LIB/maps/M499_FTX_suburban.xodr"

scenario sut.cpna_test_run inherits project_base_scenario:
    keep(default scenario_str_generic == "cpna_test_run")
    
    # 测试道路
    road: one_way_road
    
    # VRU行人
    vru: person

    # 起始和结束位置
    start_position: msp_position
    end_position: msp_position

    # 起始偏移
    start_offset: length with:
        keep(it <= road.length - 100m)

    # 自车起始速度
    start_speed: speed with:
        keep(default it in [20kph, 30kph, 40kph, 50kph, 60kph, 70kph, 80kph])

    # VRU起始偏移
    vru_start_offset: length with:
        keep(it in [start_speed * 1s + 5m..start_speed * 1s + 10m])

    # 测试持续时间
    duration_time: time with:
        keep(it >= vru_start_offset / start_speed + 2s)
        keep(it <= 3 * vru_start_offset / start_speed + 2s)

    lat_offset: length with:
        keep(it in [vru_start_offset / start_speed * 6.5kph - 1m..vru_start_offset / start_speed * 6.5kph + 1m])


    # VRU起始位置 (最右侧车道)
    position_along_road(
        start_position, 
        road, 
        lon_offset: start_offset + vru_start_offset,
        lat_offset: -lat_offset, 
        rightmost_lane: true
    )
    
    # VRU结束位置
    position_along_road(
        end_position, 
        road, 
        lon_offset: start_offset + vru_start_offset, 
        lat_offset: duration_time * 6.5kph - lat_offset, 
        rightmost_lane: true
    )
    
    on @set_up.start:
        call logger.log_info("start_speed: $(start_speed)")
        call logger.log_info("vru_start_offset: $(vru_start_offset)")
        call logger.log_info("duration_time: $(duration_time)")

    do serial():
        set_up: parallel():
            # 自车自由行驶
            ego_free_drive_phase: sut.ego_free_drive_auto_gen_one_way_road() with:
                keep(it.gen_ego_speed_at_start == start_speed)
                keep(it.ego_road_element == road)
                keep(it.gen_min_lanes == 1)
                keep(it.gen_max_lanes == 2)
                keep(it.gen_ego_lane_at_start == 1)
                keep(it.ego_start_offset == start_offset)
                keep(it.ego_driving_duration == duration_time)

            # VRU沿道路移动
            vru.move(end_position, start_position, duration: duration_time)

extend top.main:
    do sut.cpna_test_run()

extend test_additional_parameters:
    const test_index: string

extend test_config:
    set test_name = "cpna_test_run"
    set additional_parameters.test_index = "auto_20251106_075241"

name: openscenario_generation_osc_en
instruction: Please generate a valid OpenScenario v2.0 DSL file that reflects the described autonomous driving test scenario. Pay attention to the initial states of the vehicles (speed and position) and ensure that maneuvers such as LaneChange or Cut-in are correctly defined in the Storyboard. The DSL should utilize the enhanced syntax and features available in OpenSCENARIO v2.0, including but not limited to: updated parameter definitions, improved trajectory specifications, enhanced conditional logic, and modern actor behavior definitions. Ensure all elements conform to the OpenSCENARIO v2.0 specification standards and maintain backward compatibility where applicable.

instances.input: The vehicle speed is 40 km/h. A vehicle alongside cuts in 14.5m ahead at a speed of 10 km/h.
instances.output:
# 场景: cut_in_test_run
# 描述: 自车以40kph行驶,NPC车辆以10kph从相邻车道切入
# 地图: M499_FTX_suburban.xodr (市郊)

import "$PROJECT_DIR/projectLibs/project_scenario_base/project_base_scenario_model_ssp.osc"
import "$OSC2LIB/scenarios/free_drive/ego_free_drive_auto_gen/ego_free_drive_auto_gen_one_way_road_top.osc"
import "$OSC2LIB/scenarios/free_drive/npc_driving/npc_cut_in_top.osc"

extend test_config:
    set map = "$OSC2LIB/maps/M499_FTX_suburban.xodr"

scenario sut.cut_in_test_run inherits project_base_scenario:
    keep(default scenario_str_generic == "cut_in_test_run")
    
    # 测试道路
    my_road: one_way_road

    # 自车车道 (1或2)
    ego_lane: int with:
        keep(it in [1, 2])
    
    # NPC初始车道 (相邻车道)
    npc_initial_lane: int with:
        keep(it >= 1)
        keep(it in [ego_lane - 1, ego_lane + 1])

    # 起始偏移
    start_offset: length with:
        keep(it <= my_road.length - 150m)

    # 自车速度
    ego_speed: speed with:
        keep(default it == 40kph)

    # NPC车辆速度
    npc_speed: speed with:
        keep(default it == 10kph)

    # NPC相对位置
    npc_relative_position: length with:
        keep(default it == 24.5m)

    # 变道开始时间
    lane_change_start_time: time with:
        keep(default it in [0.1s..0.1s])

    # 变道持续时间
    lane_change_duration: time with:
        keep(it >= 2.5s)

    # 测试总持续时间
    duration_time: time with:
        keep(it >= lane_change_start_time + lane_change_duration + 5s)

    keep(sut.car.ftx_driver.bypass_behavior.allow_opposite_left_side == true)

    on @set_up.start:
        call logger.log_info("ego_speed: $(ego_speed)")
        call logger.log_info("npc_speed: $(npc_speed)")
        call logger.log_info("npc_relative_position: $(npc_relative_position)")
        call logger.log_info("lane_change_start_time: $(lane_change_start_time)")
        call logger.log_info("lane_change_duration: $(lane_change_duration)")
        call logger.log_info("duration_time: $(duration_time)")

    do serial():
        set_up: parallel():
            # 自车自由行驶阶段
            ego_free_drive_phase: sut.ego_free_drive_auto_gen_one_way_road() with:
                keep(it.gen_ego_speed_at_start == ego_speed)
                keep(it.ego_road_element == my_road)
                keep(it.gen_min_lanes == 2)
                keep(it.gen_max_lanes == 2)
                keep(it.gen_ego_lane_at_start == ego_lane)
                keep(it.ego_driving_duration == duration_time)

            # NPC切入阶段
            npc_cut_in_phase: sut.npc_cut_in() with:
                keep(it.npc_relative_position == self.npc_relative_position)
                keep(it.npc_initial_speed == npc_speed)
                keep(it.npc_target_speed == npc_speed)
                keep(it.npc_initial_lane == self.npc_initial_lane)
                keep(it.npc_target_lane == ego_lane)
                keep(it.npc_cut_in_start_time == lane_change_start_time)
                keep(it.npc_cut_in_duration == lane_change_duration)
                keep(it.npc_duration == duration_time)
                keep(it.ref_car == sut.car)

extend top.main:
    do sut.cut_in_test_run()

extend test_additional_parameters:
    const test_index: string

extend test_config:
    set test_name = "cut_in_test_run"
    set additional_parameters.test_index = "auto_20251120_164500"

name: openscenario_generation_osc_en
instruction: The input is a description of an autonomous driving test intent. Please generate the corresponding autonomous driving scenario file using OpenScenario v2.0 DSL syntax based on this description.

instances.input: The leading vehicle is stationary in the same lane, and the ego vehicle is traveling at 20 km/h.
instances.output:
# 测试场景: 车到车右侧分流 (CCRS - Car-to-Car Right Split)
# 描述: 测试前方有停止车辆时的避让和超车
# 场景: 自车行驶中,前方20-50米处有停止车辆(0kph)

import "$PROJECT_DIR/projectLibs/project_scenario_base/project_base_scenario_model_ssp.osc"
import "$OSC2LIB/scenarios/free_drive/ego_free_drive_auto_gen/ego_free_drive_auto_gen_one_way_road_top.osc"
import "$OSC2LIB/scenarios/free_drive/npc_driving/npc_free_driving_top.osc"

extend test_config:
    set map = "$OSC2LIB/maps/M499_FTX_suburban.xodr"

scenario sut.ccrs_test_run inherits project_base_scenario:
    keep(default scenario_str_generic == "ccrs_test_run")
    
    # 测试道路
    my_road: one_way_road

    ego_lane: int 

    keep(sut.car.ftx_driver.bypass_behavior.allow_opposite_left_side == true)

    do serial():
        set_up: parallel():
            # 自车自由行驶
            ego_free_drive_phase: sut.ego_free_drive_auto_gen_one_way_road() with:
                keep(it.gen_ego_speed_at_start in [20kph..80kph])
                keep(it.ego_road_element == my_road)
                keep(it.gen_min_lanes == 1)
                keep(it.gen_max_lanes == 2)
                keep(it.gen_ego_lane_at_start == ego_lane)
                keep(it.ego_driving_duration == 15s)

            # 前方停止NPC车辆
            npc_driving_phase: sut.npc_free_driving() with:
                keep(it.npc_relative_position in [20m..50m])
                keep(it.npc_initial_speed == 0kph)
                keep(it.npc_target_speed == 0kph)
                keep(it.gen_min_lanes == 1)
                keep(it.gen_max_lanes == 2)
                keep(it.npc_initial_lane == ego_lane)
                keep(it.npc_duration == 15s)
                keep(it.npc_initial_lane == 1)
                keep(it.ref_car == sut.car)

extend top.main:
    do sut.ccrs_test_run()

extend test_additional_parameters:
    const test_index: string

extend test_config:
    set test_name = "ccrs_test_run"
    set additional_parameters.test_index = "auto_20251106_075241"

name: openscenario_generation_xosc_en
instruction: Based on the provided autonomous driving test scenario description, please write the corresponding OpenScenario v1.0 XML file. Ensure you correctly define the initial speeds, relative positions, and lane relationships for the Ego and Target vehicles.

instances.input: The leading vehicle is traveling at 20 km/h in the same lane, and the ego vehicle is traveling at 30 km/h.
instances.output:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<OpenSCENARIO>
	<FileHeader revMajor="1" revMinor="0" date="2023-09-22T10:03:13" description="CNCAP2021AEBCCRm_TarIsCar_TargetSlow_offset100" author="catarc" />
	<ParameterDeclarations />
	<CatalogLocations>
		<VehicleCatalog>
			<Directory path="Distros/Current/Config/Players/Vehicles" />
		</VehicleCatalog>
		<PedestrianCatalog>
			<Directory path="Distros/Current/Config/Players/Pedestrians" />
		</PedestrianCatalog>
		<MiscObjectCatalog>
			<Directory path="Distros/Current/Config/Players/Objects" />
